The cream Applies nice and evenly and makes skin feel instantly smooth and hydrated.   I have been using both day and night creams and find a more even skin tone with less noticeable pores.   I have large forehead and 11 wrinkles that I am Hoping over time it will Help to make less Noticeable.    I would recommend this product as well as purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good moisturizer with smooth and soft finish. It’s not greasy and sticky that makes me feel extra comfortable for using it. I have been using it for almost a Week now and can say this is one of the best moisturizers I have used so far. Also the day light duo is something very new to me and it’s great.

reviews.review_title: My absolute new favorite skin routine!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After only using this product for 1 week, I have seen definite improvements in my skin. It is so moisturizing that my skin stays soft throughout the night and throughout the day! My fine lines and wrinkles under my eyes have already diminished. I'm impressed!! Not to mention it smells great too. Definitely would recommend!!

reviews.review_title: A wonderful day and night creams!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Juice Beauty sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program and I've been using it now for about 12 days. My skin feels so, so soft and hydrated from using the day and night creams. It's such an easy application every morning and night and smells wonderfully like lime. I've seen very small results in the fine lines on my forehead in this short amount of time, but I have really noticed the overall completion of my skin becoming more even and so soft to touch, even my husband commented on it. I truly can't wait to see what my skin will look like in a month from now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This dual product works great. After using it for about a week, I have noticed less dryness on my skin overall and my skin feels incredibly moisturised throughout the day.  The day cream has a very interesting pump I haven’t seen before as you pump the whole top and the product comes out through a whole in the middle of the product. 1-2 pumps covers my entire face. The texture of the cream glides on easily to your skin and is easily spreadable to cover your face. The smell is also absolutely amazing - if you love citrus, this is for you!   The night cream has a thicker texture compared to the day cream but also has a slightly lighter citrus scent and easily spreadable.   Both creams feels great on the skin and I can already feel improvements after a week of using both products in conjunction together. Love it!

reviews.review_title: Nice duo to add to my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using my products for about a week, and I am most excited about how they don't react poorly with my reactive, sensitive skin!  The night cream is very thick, which is ok but not my favourite texture. I love the consistency of the day cream and much prefer the delivery system to using my finger or a beauty spatula as I need to use with the night cream.  I haven't noticed a huge improvement as far as wrinkles go, but my skin feels nice! The products are scented - try small like a critrusy version of Froot Loops cereal. I definitely prefer unscented products, but these aren't overwhelming.  I am thrilled to have been selected to test this product from Bzz Agent, as I don't indulge in luxury beauty much. A little goes a long way for both the day and night creams and I can't wait to see using it as part of my routine.

reviews.review_title: My new go-to product for moisture!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Before I received a sample of this product I had never heard of it.  I've been using it now for a week and I'm not sure how I lived without it!    The first thing I noticed was the wonderfully bright citrus scent.  It's not too strong but lingers a bit which I like. I love the pump dispenser top on the day moisturizer.  It makes it easy to use the right amount  and means no mess.  The day moisturizer is light and feels good on your skin.  The night moisturizer is a bit heavier to help moisturize overnight. They both appear to be having a positive affect on my skin...it feels soft and moisturized (even in the heat which usually dries my skin out).   The price point on this product is a little higher than I would normally spend but I think the quality and results are worth it and I will definitely be purchasing again when my sample product is used up.  I will recommend this product to my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using these products for about a week now  and I think I’ve found my new fav day and night cream! I know others may disagree, but I love the citrus smell (it doesn’t linger, only smells while applying) and both creams are so rich and thick, yet absorb very quickly. My skin feels much softer, and I feel it looks better overall. The application pump on the day cream is convenient and practical. I love seeing all the natural ingredients on the ingredient list, as I am picky about what I put on my skin. Overall, I’m impressed and excited to continue using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First and foremost, I have been using the product for about a week, not enough time to see if the claims are true, but I can at least tell you that this combo is super moisturizing. For the record, my skin is dry and dehydrated, so as soon I used it the first day, I could see that it would take care of the dry part. However, the skin felt as much dehydrated as ever under the cream. I didn’t like the feeling. In the following day, I had to add another lighter cream to hydrate before and it went well. Now for the elephant in the room… I really really didn’t care for the smell. It felt like I had rubbed the skin of a lemon on my face, it smelled that strong, and it last at least an hour. Many people seem to like that smell and find it light and clean. I did not. It’s really too strong for my nose. If you are sensitive to smells, especially lemon based, I would skip this product. As for myself, even with the smell, I decided to soldier on, so I could at least give a propre review. I don’t know if I’ll keep using the product until it’s finished, but I will try, if only to see if my biggest wrinkle, the one on my forehead, is diminished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Juice Beauty Stem Cellular Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer is a really nice product! The dispenser bottle is really neat, and the lemon scent is wonderful. The cream itself melts into the skin like butter, and obsorbs beautifully. After using this product for only 2 days my skin feels so soft, and has a healthy looking glow. It's very hydrating, and works great under makeup. I highly recommend this as a daily moisturizer. I'm just not a fan of the price.   Juice Beauty Stem Cellular Anti-Wrinkle Céramide Overnight Cream is a really nice moisturizer with a relaxing lemon scent. It's slightly thicker than the day one, but it still absorbs just as great. After using this product my skin feels incredibly soft, and hydrated. It's also visibly smoother, and healthier looking. I'm absolutely obsessed, and can't wait to try other products from this line.

reviews.review_title: Every organic drop fed my skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using these products for about 10 days.  Juice Beauty sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program. They are more expensive products than I would usually purchase and I do see a difference.  I've already recommended them to my girlfriend and my cousin!  My other day cream was not as thick.  The Stem Cellualr™Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer is thick.  It feels luxurious.  My skin absorbed it very easily - and because of the consistency, I know exactly where I've applied the moisturizer. I like the packaging of The Stem Cellualr™Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer because the little pump distributes just the right amount of product.  I don't like to feel like I'm putting on too much, or not enough.  I don't like to think that I'm wasting the product. I really didn't feel a need to reapply, something I have done with my other day cream.  This product lasted and I felt hydrated for hours after I applied it.  The Stem Cellualr™Anti-Wrinkle Overnight Cream had the same lovely consistency. It was also absorbed right away.  I like that neither product left any kind of greasy residue.   I used these as a duo, so I can't tell you if one did more than the other, but I can see and feel a difference in my fine lines and the little wrinkles.  My skin feels better, softer, and more supple..  The product was easy to use and effective.  It didn't aggravate or cause any other skin irritations - no clogging, and no whiteheads, which is a concern for me.    My one reason for 4 stars and not 5 is the fragrance.  My girlfriend likes the citrus fragrance, but I do not.  I'll keep using the products because of the results, but I don't like the scent.

reviews.review_title: Skin feel so smooth and moisturize
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this package as exchange a review. After I use it for a week, I notice my skin feel much more smooth.   Skim looks very healthy. Especially the nightCream I really like the texture and the smell. Easy to apply and skin feel very moisture on the next morning. The day cream I use it before I put make up on. It won't Clog my pores. Very good product and highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review.  I've been using the Stem Cellular day and night duo by Juice Beauty for the past few weeks, and I'm thrilled with the results. The day cream is light and absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling hydrated and refreshed throughout the day. The night cream has a luxurious texture that feels nourishing and helps my skin recover overnight.  I've noticed a visible improvement in my skin's texture and overall radiance since incorporating these products into my routine. The natural ingredients in the formula, such as organic fruit stem cells, give me confidence in the product's quality and effectiveness.  The packaging is sleek and practical, making it easy to incorporate into my daily skincare regimen. The subtle, fresh scent of the products adds a pleasant touch to my skincare routine, although I would have preferred the products to be unscented.   Overall, I recommend the Stem Cellular day and night duo to anyone looking for a skincare solution that delivers results. Juice Beauty has truly impressed me with this product, and I look forward to continuing to use it for healthier, more radiant skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has got to be part of my beauty regimen! It feels so smooth on my skin. It’s very lightweight and non-greasy and I noticed lesser appearance of fine lines just few weeks after using it. I also love how it smells so amazing and it also has antioxidants which makes my skin so radiant and feeling nourished. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_title: A very nice day and night set to own!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to receive this set and see how it suits me. It has a super smooth application where the texture is not too thick or thin but a nice consistency which leaves my skin feeling saturated and soft,  Especially when I wake up in the morning. I am not too crazy about the citrus scent and would prefer something less citrusy, even Fragrance free would work too, just don’t like the smell of it. But otherwise it’s a very nice product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've used the 2 creams for about a week now and I love them. They make the skin feel soft and smooth, without overwhelming it. It will probably need more time to show 'crazy' effects on my wrinkles but they're part of my morning and evening routine and I love the way my skin feels already and that in itself is worth it.  Having been made with organic ingredients and cruelty free is also very important to me. So, they're a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me. First off it’s quite pricey and the consistency of the cream is not necessarily one my skin likes. It’s a bit too rich and I ended up with some minor breakouts probably due to the thickness that I felt like it clogged my pores. I gave it to my mom instead and it’s much better for her. I feel this is more suited for mature skin and those that prefer gel texture for easier Absorption this isn’t for you.

reviews.review_title: A nice combo for a natural simple facial routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this bundle to test out from BzzAgent and I was really excited to try it because it contains Resveratrol which I’ve been hearing a lot of buzz about — no pun intended lol. I like the fact that it’s vegan and made with naturally derived ingredients. I have very sensitive skin and so far it doesn’t irritate me at all. I can’t say I’ve used it long enough to notice a dramatic improvement in my skin but it does feel nice and soothing when applied and it does maintain and improve my skin’s hydration. I also like the pump top packaging of the moisturizer which makes it very handy to use. Having the moisturizer and overnight cream come as a duo is great for simplifying my facial routine. Overall it seems like a great product and I’ll have to use it longer to see if there are long term improvements.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, I saw the result quickly. It keep my skin clean hydrated ! Night cream is a bit too rich in my case, day cream is more light and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using these products lately and have definitely noticed a difference in how soft my skin is within an hour of using it. They have a strong lemon scent which I love but might not be for everyone. I was pleased to see that the cream and moisturizer are also organic and best of all they are cruelty free.  I haven’t noticed a difference in my fine lines but I'm hoping to see an improvement with time. I also have sensitive skin and I haven’t had any reactions or break outs so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a new skin routine because of this product.  I have been using both the day and night moisturizer for a week. Both are quick to be absorbed by my skin, despite how creamy the night cream is.  My skin feels well moisturized and smooth hours after application, and I could see my skin has more glow since I began using both products. Absolutely LOVE these products  lightweight yet so hydrating , they leave my skin hydrated fresh and plump also love the lemon scent.

reviews.review_title: Lovely duo worth all the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this duo for the last week and have noticed how much more hydrated my skin is. The day moisturizer is light and does not leave a greasy feel. Easily can layer with a sunscreen. The scent is light and fresh citrus.  The night cream is a lot more dense and hydrates beautifully. I will be buying this again and in comparison to some other night creams, the moisturizer will not mess my pillow case if I sleep on my side. My skin enjoys this duo and feels supple after wearing.

reviews.review_title: Stem cellar day and night duo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am using this product from a week and I am really happy with the result. It comes with combo of day and night so good source of hydrating skin day and night too. My skin is very dry so it really helps me for dryness and moisten my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: after one week of using this product my skin feels moisturized and soft. I haven't yet seen a difference in my wrinkles but I feel a difference how plump my skin feels.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Juice Beauty Stem Cellar Day & Night Duo might just become a staple in my skincare regimen. Its plant-based, organic formulation aligns with my preference for natural products,  that ensures my skin receives the best care without harmful chemicals. The duo’s effectiveness in hydrating, repairing, and rejuvenating my skin has left me super impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product a few weeks ago through BzzAgent.  I really love the smell of both the day and night cream. They are very citrus forward and kind of smell like fruit loops. The day cream has a pump top which I'm not a fan of, as you can't get all of the product out at the end or if the pump just decided to stop working. The night cream does not have one.  Of the two, the night cream is my favorite. It's really thick and moisturizing and doesn't really leave a greasy residue on your hands when done applying. The day cream is thinner but I found it to be super slick looking on my skin. I don't wear makeup, but I'm sure if I used a powder over top I would have looked dewy and fresh as opposed to just greasy. After a couple of weeks of use my face (hands and elbows where I always rub the excess into) feel really soft. I'm sure with more time I will see more results with regards to fine lines. I will be purchasing the night cream again in the future. I absolutely love it.  I'm not sure if this is a me problem or if this is what the product is supposed to do, after application my face would start to burn slightly (not painfully, just like I got a little too much sun on it) , turn red and feel hot to the touch for about 10-15 mins then be fine again. I've used other vitamin c creams and never reacted like this before. At this point in time I haven't seen anyone else discuss it in their review.

reviews.review_title: A great addition to my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Juice Beauty sent me this item for free through Bzzagent samling program. I've been using this anti wrinkle duo for a week now. First of all I really like the presser on the  moisturizer to get a right amount for your face. For me the other thing I noticed right away is the scent. The scent feels very fresh and light. Even though I only used both the day and night duo for a short period of time  I have already noticed a difference in hydration in my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Juice Beauty stem Cellular day & night duo works so good on my skin. I suffer from very dry skin and these creams work great.  I also add a few drops of their replenishing oil and I get the perfect looking glow. I also love the fact that this is a cruelty free, vegan and made with organic ingredients, so I feel good using it. The day cream also has a little pump action dispenser which is great to keep it clean and provides you with a good amount.  I usually use about 2 pumps for each application. The product does have a scent to it, but it doesn't seem overwhelming or fake smelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for 1 week. I am noticing a smoothing effect to my wrinkles. Also more definition to my jawline.  I love the scent of it when i am doing my morning and evening routine. It is fresh. It absorbs without a greasy or other leftover film feeling. Thank you. I will update this in a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this moisturizing duo.  My skin feels hydrated and soft after using them and I really like that they are made from organic ingredients.  Also I really love the citrusy scent!

reviews.review_title: A comprehensive & must have skincare excellence
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Juice Beauty Stem Cellular Day and Night Duo stands out among other skincare products I’ve tried for various reasons. Firstly, it organic ingredients, which is a different formular from the other common skincare brands that rely heavily on synthetic compounds. These duo are luxurious and absorbs well into the skin without leaving a greasy residue. In comparison to other products, the Juice Beauty duo feels more nourishing and hydrating, likely due to its blend of stem cells and Vitamin C. Considering my skin type, i am always very cautious of what i consume on my skin and i have always had to change skincare product but with the stem cellar day and night duo, in few weeks of usage, my skin feels fresh and reduction in fine lines and wrinkles, which highlights its efficacy in anti-aging care. Certainly, i am sticking to these duo for as long as possible as i feel i have finally gotten what my skin needs and deserves. so, i am going to be ordering some new sets as soon as possible and i will be getting some more for my friends so that their skin can look great too.  Overall, the Juice Beauty Stem Cellular Day and Night Duo offers a comprehensive, high-quality skincare solution that is both effective and ethically produced. It is a product worth trying for anyone looking to enhance their skincare routine with organic and potent formulations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using both the day and night moisturizer for a week. Both are quick to be absorbed by my skin, despite how creamy the night cream is.  My skin feels well moisturized and smooth hours after application, and I could see my skin has more glow since I began using both products. They do have a strong lemon scent, which may bother some people but I didn’t mind.

reviews.review_title: Great formula and pump, but scent is too strong
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nearing 40, I’m very mindful of skincare products that will aid in ridding wrinkles and fine lines without the use of retinol. While I loved the formula and also the unique pump, I wasn’t a fan of the lemongrass scent! It reminded me of mosquito repellant. But the formula itself is very hydrating and smooth so I would still recommend this if you don’t mind the scent.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my everyday cosmetics collections
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using the product for just 4 days now. i ca see the difference, the face looks cleaner and fresher and even smother.

reviews.review_title: A new favourite for my facecare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a 52-year-old woman, I am very mindful about the skincare products I use and I can confidently say that Juice Beauty's Stem Cellular Duo is a true gem. From the first application, I noticed that the moisturizer (day) and cream (night) are incredibly nourishing, absorbing quickly without leaving any greasy residue. The nighttime cream is slightly thicker, which I appreciate because It feels luxurious and I wake up with my skin feeling soft and supple. The fresh, natural citrus scent is a delightful bonus. After consistently using this duo for a week, I can truly say, that my skin looks firmer, plumper, and more radiant.  I also really love Juice Beauty's commitment to clean, organic ingredients. Knowing I'm treating my skin with high-quality, non-toxic ingredients gives me peace of mind.  I am so grateful for the opportunity to try and review these products. Compared to other products I have used, they are worth every penny and have earned a permanent spot in my skincare regime. I highly recommend this duo to anyone looking to rejuvenate their skin and maintain a more youthful appearance. Thank you, Juice Beauty, for creating such a wonderful product!

reviews.review_title: Must have skincare essentials with visible results
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I finally found the Anti-Wrinkle Moisturizer and an Overnight Cream which actually has a more targeted effect and suits my skin. Juice Beauty Stem Cellular Day and Night Duo is the perfect addition and an essential to my daily skincare routine. I have been using it for the past couple of days and noticed an improvement right after the first use. Both these products act like a treatment which my skin needs.   The lightweight moizturizer is hydrating. I have been applying it every morning to my cleansed face. The pump packaging is great as it prevents waste and contamination. With a light press, I was able to dispense just the right amount of product. After applying, my skin felt soft and smooth. It also gave a radiant look. I loved the citrus smell. This moisturizer is fast-absorbing. The best part, it did not feel sticky.   The overnight cream is amazing. It is intensely hydrating. It is a rich cream but does not feel too heavy on the skin which is great. I have been applying this every night after cleanser. At night is when my skin is at rest and breathing, and this cream worked wonders in replenishing and restoring the skin's moisture. Since minimal tired lines, dryness and dullness is normally visible at the end of the day but the next morning, my skin looked and felt so healthy, revitalized, hydrated, soft, smooth and supple. Also, I noticed that it did reduced the appearance of minimal lines which were visible especially around the eyes.   Overall, I am in love with the smell of both the products. For me, it is not too overpowering and settles beautifully. The packaging of these products are amazing and it appears that the quality of these products will remain at its best. I love Juice Beayty products because of the visible results. It feels like I had a luxurious spa treatment. These duo works best together as I have noticed that it improved the appearance of my skin ever since I started using it. My skin is loving the benefits and hence I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a trial, I like the feel of the creams, they do work well, it’s only been a week and I see a difference.  While the scent is a tad overpowering it does go away when used.  I would buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve just recently turned 40 and I’ve been on the hunt for great day/night creams that I can add to my skin care routine.  I was given the opportunity to try Juice Beauty’s Stem Cellular Duo, and I’m not only pleased with the results (softer, more supple skin, diminished fine lines, a more even skin tone and no more dry skin), but it smells great too (lemon/lemongrass).   They’re easy to apply (the daytime cream has a top pump that pumps out exactly what you need) and take no time at all to dry (no greasy residue left behind). I would apply the cream and by the time I finished brushing my teeth, my face was ready for make up! Not only do these products work (I started noticing results within 7 days) but you only need to apply a small amount. These 2 50ml jars are going to last a long time!  Honestly, if you’re looking for great skin care products that are will leave your skin noticeably brighter, softer, more moisturized and healthier, purchase Juice Beauty’s Stem Cellular! These 2 products are now a staple in my day/night skin care routine! Love them!
